channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: South Korea orders airports to install bird detection cameras
item.description: The directive comes as investigators focus on bird strike as one of the causes for December's deadly plane crash.

item.title: Israel minister tells army to plan for Palestinians leaving Gaza
item.description: Defence Minister Israel Katz says Gazans should have freedom of movement and critics of the war should take them in.

item.title: Israel defense minister tells army to prepare to relocate Palestinians from Gaza
item.description: He says the military should prepare exit options by land, sea and air so that anyone who wishes to can leave for "any country willing to accept them."

item.title: Is it real or is it a trick? Federal workers debate legitimacy of buyout offer as deadline nears
Millions of federal workers face Feb. 6 deadline over whether to resign
item.description: Unions are suing to halt the Trump administration's "deferred resignation" offer, claiming it is against the law and jeopardizes workers.

item.title: Even now, Ke Huy Quan doesn't feel good enough — but that narrative is changing
item.description: The Everything, Everywhere, All at Once star says the day after he won his Oscar for the role, he woke up thinking, "Was that all a dream?"

item.title: Sneak peek: It's About Danni
item.description: All new: When 15-year-old Danni Houchins is found dead in a swamp, her family says they were led to believe she drowned. 24 years later, Danni's siste...

item.title: FBI agents, prosecutors fear retribution from Jan. 6 rioters pardoned by Trump
item.description: Officials involved in Jan. 6 prosecutions say the Trump administration isn't protecting them from threats. "We don't think they'll care — unless and u...

item.title: Panama denies US claims over free canal passages
item.description: Washington had suggested Panama had agreed to no longer charge fees for US government vessels using the waterway.

item.title: Here's who will perform at the Super Bowl on Sunday
item.description: Kendrick Lamar is headlining the halftime show with special guest SZA. Jon Batiste will sing the national anthem.

item.title: Syrian refugees killed in Swedish gunman's attack on school
item.description: There are also reports that Bosnians were caught up in the worst shooting in Swedish history.

item.title: Irv Gotti, music executive who founded Murder, Inc., dies at 54
item.description: Irv Gotti, the famed hip-hop music executive from NYC, has died at the age of 54, Def Jam confirms.

item.title: Cocaine "no worse than whiskey," Colombia's president says
item.description: Cocaine "is no worse than whisky" and is only illegal because it comes from Latin America, said Colombian President Gustavo Petro, whose nation is the...

item.title: How much are Super Bowl 2025 tickets? Average, cheapest, priciest seats
item.description: From the cheapest to priciest seats, here's how much Super Bowl tickets cost in 2025.

item.title: Strong earthquake near Santorini after days of tremors
item.description: More than 11,000 people have already left the island of Santorini in recent days.

item.title: Federal resignation deadline looms. And, the implications of a USAID shutdown
item.description: It's decision day for millions of federal employees who find themselves at a "fork in the road." And, the Trump administration's plans to shut down US...

item.title: What to know about the court cases over President Trump’s birthright citizenship order
Protesters in cities across the US rally against Trump’s policies, Project 2025 and Elon Musk
item.description: Demonstrators have gathered in cities across the U.S. to protest the Trump administration’s early actions.
